column2: "Thank you for coming. There's something occurring on the time axis that I wanted to talk to you about."
"According to my analysis, this is the place."
"Can you hear me, Xion? At last, I was able to track you down to here."
"It seems there is a lot of movement. I didn't expect the appearance of a new type, the Dewmans though."
"I suppose it's the result of intervening with history."
"Well, it's not like I'm angry. I wouldn't want to pick a fight with you."
"Heheh... Though I'm still unable to see you."
"I want, so much, to understand you... but I suppose you just aren't ready yet."
"Well, I don't want to spoil your mood. I shall excuse myself for today."
"How was that? Was she listening?"
"I really should thank you. Because of you, I've been able to gain some understanding of her."
"Why she does some things and not others... It's fascinating to watch."

"My name is Luther. I'm the head of the Research Division...
Or to give it its true name, the Void Facility."
"Well then, until we meet again."
"He cannot see me. He cannot even hear my voice. And yet, he is aware of my presence."
"He is the reason I have entrusted everything to you."
"I do not want to trust fate to him."
"But... The reason he became warped is because I also exist."
"The origin of that curiosity is my greatest regret. That is why I entrust everything to you."
"So that's Luther... Leader of the Photoners."
"Technically correct, but it would be more accurate to call him the only Photoner."
"All the others who go by that name merely wish to become Photoners. But it is beyond their reach."
"When [Elder]'s seal was broken, the artificial dragon was able to break free. The one who was behind it had become impatient, and overplayed their hand."
"But the first to make contact with the enemy was that person... I wonder why."
"I don't care about that. I only want to destroy the monster who ruined my life and Hadred's."

"Quna, <%me> is the key.
You understand that, yes?"
"I'll fight my own way. I have no intention of working with you, Casra of the Council... of the Three Heroes."
"Besides, you know the position that you're in, don't you."
"Yes, I know, Quna. When all this is over, my life is in your hands, for you to do as you will."
"That was our agreement. As long as you bear this risk, I will keep my promise."
"I really hate that face of yours. Just what are you after?"
"At present, the same as yourself."
"Hm."
"I've obeyed you this far. But now, Luther..."

"
Received Matter Board [Destination of the Wrong Path]
"
